data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Rhipidia Meigen from China, with descriptions of seven new species (Diptera, Limoniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Xiao, Li, Yan, Yang, Ding (2014): A review of the genus Rhipidia Meigen from China, with descriptions of seven new species (Diptera, Limoniidae). Zootaxa 3764 (3): 201-239, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3764.3.2
